        public char possibleMove(int x,
                         int y,
                         GameLogic game)
        Evaluates what char is present in those coordinates. Is aware of other game components.
        Parameters:
        x - This is the x coordinate
        y - This is the y coordinate
        game - This is an object of the GameLogic class
        Returns:
        char This returns a char representative of a character's next move position
